attributes.action: QUESTION FOR 2nd VOTE, 1/ REMAIN IN THE E.U. 2/ LEAVE THE E.U.UNDER W.T.O. RULES
attributes.additional_details:
MUCH HAS BEEN MADE ABOUT THE FACT THAT PEOPLE VOTING IN THE 2016 REFERENDUM DIDN’T UNDERSTAND WHAT THEY WERE VOTING FOR, SO BY GIVING THEM ONLY THE FOLLOWING TWO CHOICES, A MUCH MORE INFORMED CHOICE CAN BE MADE BY THEM, SO THAT PARLIAMENT ARE UNDER NO ILLUSIONS ABOUT WHAT THE BRITISH PEOPLE REALLY WANT AND THEREFORE PARLIAMENT CAN THEN TAKE ACTION IN ACCORDANCE WITH THE RESULT OF THE SECOND REFERENDUM.
THE QUESTION SHOULD NOW BE.
1/ REMAIN IN THE E.U. 
2/ LEAVE THE E.U. UNDER W.T.O. RULES
attributes.background: PARLIAMENT HAS FAILED TO CARRY OUT THE DEMOCRATIC WISHES OF THE ELECTORATE FOLLOWING THE 2016 REFERENDUM, WHICH WAS TO LEAVE THE E.U. THERE IS NO AGREEMENT IN PARLIAMENT OVER THE BREXIT WITHDRAWAL AGREEMENT, AS IT DOES NOT TAKE US OUT OF THE E.U.,SO THE WITHDRAWAL AGREEMENT SHOULD NOT BE AN OPTION.
